products.name: Red Rose
products.description: A classic symbol of love and passion, our Red Roses are perfect for romantic occasions.

products.name: White Lily
products.description: Elegant and pure, White Lilies are ideal for weddings and formal events.

products.name: Sunflower
products.description: Bright and cheerful, Sunflowers are perfect for adding a touch of sunshine to any room.

products.name: Tulip
products.description: Available in a variety of colors, Tulips are a versatile choice for any bouquet.

products.name: Orchid
products.description: Exotic and stunning, Orchids add a touch of luxury to any arrangement.

products.name: Daisy
products.description: Simple and charming, Daisies are perfect for creating a fresh and innocent look.

products.name: Peony
products.description: With their large, fluffy blooms, Peonies are a favorite for bridal bouquets.

products.name: Lavender
products.description: Known for their soothing scent, Lavender flowers are perfect for relaxation and aromatherapy.

products.name: Carnation
products.description: With their ruffled petals, Carnations are a popular choice for a variety of occasions.

products.name: Hydrangea
products.description: Known for their large, spherical flower heads, Hydrangeas are a stunning addition to any arrangement.
